7// Sampler.cpp : Implements the Sampler class, which represents a GLES 3
8// sampler object. Sampler objects store some state needed to sample textures.
9
10#include "libANGLE/Sampler.h"
11#include "libANGLE/angletypes.h"
12#include "libANGLE/renderer/GLImplFactory.h"
13#include "libANGLE/renderer/SamplerImpl.h"
14
15namespace gl
16{
17
18Sampler::Sampler(rx::GLImplFactory *factory, SamplerID id)
19 : RefCountObject(factory->generateSerial(), id),
20 mState(),
21 mDirty(true),
22 mSampler(factory->createSampler(mState)),
23 mLabel()
24{}
25
26Sampler::~Sampler()
27{
28 SafeDelete(mSampler);
29}
30
31void Sampler::onDestroy(const Context *context)
32{
33 if (mSampler)
34 {
35 mSampler->onDestroy(context);
36 }
37}
38
39void Sampler::setLabel(const Context *context, const std::string &label)
40{
41 mLabel = label;
42}
43
44const std::string &Sampler::getLabel() const
45{
46 return mLabel;
47}
48
49void Sampler::setMinFilter(const Context *context, GLenum minFilter)
50{
51 mState.setMinFilter(minFilter);
52 signalDirtyState();
53}
54
55GLenum Sampler::getMinFilter() const
56{
57 return mState.getMinFilter();
58}
59
60void Sampler::setMagFilter(const Context *context, GLenum magFilter)
61{
62 mState.setMagFilter(magFilter);
63 signalDirtyState();
64}
65
66GLenum Sampler::getMagFilter() const
67{
68 return mState.getMagFilter();
69}
70
71void Sampler::setWrapS(const Context *context, GLenum wrapS)
72{
73 mState.setWrapS(wrapS);
74 signalDirtyState();
75}
76
77GLenum Sampler::getWrapS() const
78{
79 return mState.getWrapS();
80}
81
82void Sampler::setWrapT(const Context *context, GLenum wrapT)
83{
84 mState.setWrapT(wrapT);
85 signalDirtyState();
86}
87
88GLenum Sampler::getWrapT() const
89{
90 return mState.getWrapT();
91}
92
93void Sampler::setWrapR(const Context *context, GLenum wrapR)
94{
95 mState.setWrapR(wrapR);
96 signalDirtyState();
97}
98
99GLenum Sampler::getWrapR() const
100{
101 return mState.getWrapR();
102}
103
104void Sampler::setMaxAnisotropy(const Context *context, float maxAnisotropy)
105{
106 mState.setMaxAnisotropy(maxAnisotropy);
107 signalDirtyState();
108}
109
110float Sampler::getMaxAnisotropy() const
111{
112 return mState.getMaxAnisotropy();
113}
114
115void Sampler::setMinLod(const Context *context, GLfloat minLod)
116{
117 mState.setMinLod(minLod);
118 signalDirtyState();
119}
120
121GLfloat Sampler::getMinLod() const
122{
123 return mState.getMinLod();
124}
125
126void Sampler::setMaxLod(const Context *context, GLfloat maxLod)
127{
128 mState.setMaxLod(maxLod);
129 signalDirtyState();
130}
131
132GLfloat Sampler::getMaxLod() const
133{
134 return mState.getMaxLod();
135}
136
137void Sampler::setCompareMode(const Context *context, GLenum compareMode)
138{
139 mState.setCompareMode(compareMode);
140 signalDirtyState();
141}
142
143GLenum Sampler::getCompareMode() const
144{
145 return mState.getCompareMode();
146}
147
148void Sampler::setCompareFunc(const Context *context, GLenum compareFunc)
149{
150 mState.setCompareFunc(compareFunc);
151 signalDirtyState();
152}
153
154GLenum Sampler::getCompareFunc() const
155{
156 return mState.getCompareFunc();
157}
158
159void Sampler::setSRGBDecode(const Context *context, GLenum sRGBDecode)
160{
161 mState.setSRGBDecode(sRGBDecode);
162 signalDirtyState();
163}
164
165GLenum Sampler::getSRGBDecode() const
166{
167 return mState.getSRGBDecode();
168}
169
170void Sampler::setBorderColor(const Context *context, const ColorGeneric &color)
171{
172 mState.setBorderColor(color);
173 signalDirtyState();
174}
175
176const ColorGeneric &Sampler::getBorderColor() const
177{
178 return mState.getBorderColor();
179}
180
181const SamplerState &Sampler::getSamplerState() const
182{
183 return mState;
184}
185
186rx::SamplerImpl *Sampler::getImplementation() const
187{
188 return mSampler;
189}
190
191angle::Result Sampler::syncState(const Context *context)
192{
193 ASSERT(isDirty());
194 angle::Result result = mSampler->syncState(context, mDirty);
195 mDirty = result != angle::Result::Continue;
196 return result;
197}
198
199void Sampler::signalDirtyState()
200{
201 mDirty = true;
202 onStateChange(angle::SubjectMessage::DirtyBitsFlagged);
203}
204
205} // namespace gl
